review: Wow what a fabulous idea , this is a very handy product .This is something everyone should have in your car.This is a great tray you can attach to your steering wheel ,it attaches very easily and is just as easy to remove .It is extremely well made, it is made of high quality materials .It measures 16 x 11 x 4 inches, which is a great size .You can use this as a food tray or as a tray for your laptop or other devices .My thinking behind getting this is for when we go to the drive-in , this is so great for holding all our goodies .We have used it a couple times, and this was amazing .It really did what we needed it for.It is also easy and convenient to store anywhere in your car.We really love ours and you will too.I highly recommend this great tray,I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
productTitle: Zone Tech Car Laptop and Food Steering Wheel Tray (Black)
